content.rendered: My good friend Simon turned 40 this year. To celebrate we joined a crowd of (mostly) greying, middle aged men at the DJ Shadow and Cut Chemist "Renegades of Rhythm" show at Manchester's Albert Hall. I was inspired to cut a stencil of the popular refrain of the night, to which Simon would unfailingly respond, "NOISE!".
